testcase.name: Successful Login with Valid Credentials
testcase.system-out: Given the browser is open and the URL is entered............................passed When the valid username and password are entered............................passed And the Login button is clicked.............................................passed And the MallUser link is clicked............................................passed Then the User page text is validated........................................passed

testcase.name: Verify MallUser Add Functionality
testcase.system-out: When the Add User button is clicked.........................................passed Then the user is on the Add User page.......................................passed When all the necessary data is filled.......................................passed And the Save button is clicked..............................................passed Then the new MallUser is verified...........................................passed

testcase.name: Verify MallUser Edit Functionality
testcase.system-out: When a user is selected and the Edit button is clicked......................passed And the Username is modified................................................passed And the Save button is clicked..............................................passed Then the modified user name is verified.....................................passed

testcase.name: Verify MallUser delete Functionality
testcase.system-out: When a user is selected and the delete button is clicked....................passed Then the user should no longer appear in the list...........................passed
